member.summary: Create elevation views in room with crop offset by rooms , floorplan and offset. Default naming is - "RoomName_RoomNumber - A", "RoomName_RoomNumber - B", "RoomName_RoomNumber - C", "RoomName_RoomNumber - D".
member.param: Room elements and make sure all room are bounding

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.TransferViewTemplateAndFilter(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfer View Templates from a link document to current document with or without associate filters(including override settings). Default include filters.
member.param: A Link document which includes view templates
If true, filters and settings will include with view template. If false, filters and settings will not include, only view templates will tranfer. default value true.
